TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerRegionCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 代表控制項設計工具中的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和任何衍生的類別，會使用類別，以包含，例如列舉在設計主機中，控制項將設計工具區域[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]。The class, and any derived class, uses the class to contain and enumerate the designer regions for the control in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]. 例如，方法可以用來定義，並將區域加入至集合。For example, the method can be used to define and add regions to the collection. 使用屬性來存取控制項設計工具物件，其中包含設計工具區域集合。Use the property to access the control designer object that contains the designer region collection. 使用方法和屬性來檢查及維護集合中的物件。Use the methods and properties to examine and maintain the objects that are in the collection. 集合會動態增加加入物件時。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 在此集合中的索引都以零為起始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用屬性來判斷多少的設計工具區域集合中。Use the property to determine how many designer regions are in the collection. 使用成員提供下列功能：Use the members to provide the following functionality: - 方法，將單一的設計工具區域加入至集合。The method to add a single designer region to the collection. - 方法，將設計工具區域集合內的特定索引處。The method to add a designer region at a particular index within the collection. - 方法移除設計工具區域。The method to remove a designer region. - 方法移除特定索引處的設計工具區域。The method to remove the designer region at a particular index. - 方法，以判斷特定的設計工具區域已經位於集合中。The method to determine whether a particular designer region is already in the collection. - 方法來擷取設計工具區域集合中的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a designer region within the collection. - 索引子以取得或設定設計工具區域的特定的索引，使用陣列標記法。The indexer to get or set the designer region at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法從集合中移除所有設計工具區域。The method to remove all designer regions from the collection.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式來建立空的集合。Use the constructor to create an empty collection. 您可以將項目加入集合使用或方法。You can add elements to the collection by using the or method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 擁有這個設計工具區域集合的控制項設計工具。

span.span: The control designer that owns this collection of designer regions.

summary.span: 為指定的控制項設計工具，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified control designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會建立空的集合，並設定屬性指定的控制項設計工具物件。The constructor creates an empty collection and sets the property to the specified control designer object. 視覺設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用建構函式初始化特定控制項設計工具的設計工具區域集合。The visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the constructor to initialize a designer region collection for a specific control designer. 您可以將項目加入集合使用或方法。You can add elements to the collection by using the or method.

span.span: The to add to the collection.

span.span: Adds the specified object to the end of the collection.

returns.span: 在集合中加入區域的索引位置。

span.span: The index at which the region was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將指定物件集合的結尾。The method adds the specified object to the end of the collection. 若要加入物件至集合中的指定索引位置，請使用方法。To add a object to the collection at a specific index location, use the method.

summary.span: 從集合移除所有的區域。

span.span: Removes all regions from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法從集合中移除所有區域。Use the method to remove all regions from the collection. 若要從集合移除的特定區域，請使用方法。To remove a specific region from the collection, use the method. 若要移除特定索引處的區域，請使用方法。To remove a region at a particular index, use the method.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the specified region is contained within the collection.

returns.span: 如果區域位於集合中則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if the region is in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷等號比較使用方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法執行的線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成比例屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 由於樣板區域集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得集合中 物件的數目。

span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中的 物件數目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來逐一查看集合中的物件時決定上限索引。The property is commonly used to determine the upper boundary index when iterating through objects in the collection. 第一個項目集合的索引是以零為起始的因為是在索引`0`和最後一個項目是在索引`Count-1`。Because the collection indexes are zero-based, the first element is at index `0` and the last element is at index `Count-1`.

summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性和迴圈建構，例如`while`， `for`，或`foreach`陳述式，以列舉物件。Use the property together with a loop construct, such as `while`, `for`, or `foreach` statements, to enumerate through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷等號比較使用方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects. 方法執行的線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成比例屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 由於樣板區域集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示是否要同步處理 (執行緒安全) 對 物件的存取。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果對 的存取是同步的則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: , if access to the is synchronized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不在本質上是安全執行緒程序列舉集合。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 列舉型別造成例外狀況。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 使用中鎖定集合保證的執行緒安全，以在整個列舉過程的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the whole enumeration to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用擷取集合中的指定索引處的區域，或是設定的區域集合中的指定索引處的索引子。Use the indexer to retrieve the region at the specified index within the collection or to set the region at the specified index within the collection. 您可以使用陣列標記法索引集合中的項目。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，您可以建立索引的索引處的項目`i`加上標記法`DesignerRegions(i)`如 Microsoft VisualBasic 或`DesignerRegions[i]`C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `DesignerRegions(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `DesignerRegions[i]` for C#. 當您有區域物件的參考，而且需要在集合中物件的索引時，使用方法。When you have a reference to the region object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

is greater than the property.

value.span: ，表示擁有 的控制項設計工具。

span.span: A that represents the control designer that owns the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供方便的方式存取設計工具區域集合的控制項設計工具物件。The property provides a convenient means to access the control designer object for a designer region collection. 例如，您可以使用屬性來判斷擁有集合的控制項設計工具的型別，以及存取的屬性和方法的控制項設計工具。For example, you can use the property to determine the type of control designer that owns the collection and to access the properties and methods of the control designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion region) cil managed

param.name: region
param.span: 要從集合中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the collection.

summary.span: 從集合中移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法從集合中移除第一個出現的指定區域。The method removes the first occurrence of the specified region from the collection. 如果物件不包含指定`region`，維持不變的集合。If the object does not contain the specified `region`, the collection remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 方法會判斷等號比較使用方法物件。The method determines equality by using the method on the object. 方法執行的線性搜尋; 因此，平均執行時間成比例屬性。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the property. 由於樣板區域集合通常很小，線性搜尋作業的效能不重要。Because template region collections are typically small, the performance of the linear search operation is not critical. 若要從集合中移除特定索引處的區域，使用方法。To remove a region at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要從集合中移除所有區域，使用方法。To remove all regions from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您從集合移除項目時，集合中後續項目的索引將會變更。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index within the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法從集合移除特定索引處的區域。Use the method to remove a region at a particular index from the collection. 若要從集合中移除指定的區域，使用方法。To remove a specified region from the collection, use the method. 若要從集合中移除所有區域，使用方法。To remove all regions from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 當您從集合移除項目時，集合中後續項目的索引將會變更。When you remove an item from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection.
